content:
There are some problems in "The Computational Complexity Column."
First, the reference is not there (the bib file missing?)
Second, each page has two page numbers in the same place.
author: CAO Yixin

content: great but plz hyperlink the TOC!
author: vz nuri
title: great but plz hyperlink the TOC!

content:
Yixin, thanks for pointing out the problem in the pdf file for the whole issue. I will ask the Secretary Office to look into this. The issues do not arise in the version of that contribution that is available at

http://bulletin.eatcs.org/index.php/beatcs/article/view/339/321

vz nuri, thanks; we should indeed do this. However, for easy access to individual contributions, I encourage you to look at the Open Journal version of the Bulletin, which, for this issue, is at

http://bulletin.eatcs.org/index.php/beatcs/issue/view/18

We will do our best to improve.
author: Luca Aceto
